pages.text: Tartuosteus is a 2 meter long herbivorous agnathan. They may have used their unique body shape to move more swiftly around the oceans. They may have also used their head to rustle up algae and sediment to get food.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
